name: @aws/language-server-runtimes-types
description: Type definitions in Language Servers and Runtimes for AWS

scripts.compile: echo 'INFO: Running types compile' && pwd && tsc --build
scripts.prepub:copyFiles: echo 'INFO: Running types copyFiles' && pwd && shx cp ../LICENSE ../NOTICE ../SECURITY.md . && echo 'INFO: Finished types copyFiles'
scripts.prepub: echo 'INFO: Running types prepub' && pwd && npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run prepub:copyFiles
scripts.pub: echo 'INFO: Running types pub' && pwd && npm publish

author: Amazon Web Services
